title: Input schema for SERP based Amazon scraper

queries.title: Search Queries
queries.description: (Required if you don't use 'Input URL') Here you can provide a list of search queries as a Javascript array. This takes precedence over 'Input URL'.

inputUrl.title: Input URL
inputUrl.description: (Required if you don't use 'Search Queries') Here you can provide a list of search URLs.

countryCode.title: Country
countryCode.description:
Country determines the IP address of the proxy used for the query and the Google Shopping domain (e.g. google.es for Spain).

This setting only applies to Search queries, but not to URLs.

maxPostCount.title: Max Post Count
maxPostCount.description: Limit of the results to be scraped per page (0 means no limit)

extendOutputFunction.title: Extend output function
extendOutputFunction.description: A function which result will get merged with the default result. It must return an object.
